collection.name: Portrait of Another World
collection.openText: This portrait captures a moment. It is what we must lose.

specialTipSize.specialTip: The first employee to see the Abnormality will be portraited on the canvas.

All damage done to the employee will be taken by another employee in the facility. (However, the effect does not apply to damage that exceeds the maximum HP of the employee engraved on the canvas.) They will receive increased damage.
Once damaged employee dies, another employee will their spot. When no more employees remain, the employee painted in the portrait will die.
If a new employee is shown on the canvas, the previous employee will be killed.
If the employee who is in the portrait is killed other than by the portrait, the portrait will return its original state.
